nodes.text: A spaceport was located on the Mid Rim planet of Eroudac. When the Garsea family moved to Eroudac, Izal Garsea spent most of her time at the spaceport, burning the Meridian's fuel after doing solo trips to nowhere.
The spaceport was first mentioned in the 2019 novel A Crash of Fate, written by Zoraida Córdova.
